title: The Watched
description: Get the first 3 books in the CSI Reilly Steel Box Set and save 50% on the RRPFrom the USA TODAY bestselling author of TABOO. "If you like Patricia Cornwell or Kathy Reichs, you'll love this." LOVEREADING.Quantico-trained forensic investigator Reilly Steel is back in the country of her birth. Unsure about both her future and her position within the Dublin police force, Reilly hopes that a relaxing stay at the Florida beach home of her old FBI mentor Daniel Forrest will help get her thoughts together.When Daniel's son, policeman Todd Forrest, is called to the scene of a gruesome murder where the body of a beautiful woman has literally been torn in two, he is stopped in his tracks. Not just because of the grotesque and theatrical nature of the crime but because he recognizes the victim as Daniel's goddaughter.In an attempt to find swift resolution on her old friend's behalf, Reilly finds herself drawn into the investigation. And when another disturbing murder occurs soon after, Reilly can't help but feel that she has come across something like this before. But where?And will Reilly's brief hiatus in the US force her into a decision about her future in Dublin, and the unfinished business she has there?CSI Reilly Steel #1 SERIAL (aka TABOO)#2 VICTIM#3 HIDDEN#4 THE WATCHED#5 CRIME SCENE#6 TRACE#7 AFTERMATH#8 ENDGAME#9 FALLOUT (coming 2020)Books are standalone and can be read in order but are best enjoyed in sequence.
author: Casey Hill
